TopicTitle: Why SpaceY Rocks, Pt. 1: MOAR BOOSTERS

Articles.Content:
The first of a two-part tribute to SpaceY Heavy-Lifter Parts and SpaceY Expanded, a set of KSP mods for making massive rockets, by Necrobones.

If this seems particularly silly, I blame sleep deprivation -- which, incidentally, makes for particularly silly rockets.﻿
